# COPY ALL OF THESE TO VERCEL ENVIRONMENT VARIABLES
# Go to: Vercel Dashboard → Your Project → Settings → Environment Variables
# Add each line as a separate environment variable

# ===== DATABASE =====
# Using your local PostgreSQL database connection
# IMPORTANT: Update the host to your actual database server (not localhost)
# If using Vercel Postgres, this will be auto-generated
DATABASE_URL=postgresql://postgres:space@your-database-host:5432/subtle_db?sslmode=require

# ===== JWT CONFIGURATION =====
JWT_SECRET=76cb1ca2e91953636195a783ca19fe53c9753ecf38b1685659eb8e7ca11088ae
JWT_REFRESH_SECRET=424e6e263fd8a38dc4fe9072ba13e5ca4f1f51bd35cb9466274ac2fd6617bf9a
JWT_EXPIRES_IN=1h
JWT_REFRESH_EXPIRES_IN=7d

# ===== ENCRYPTION =====
# Must be exactly 32 characters
ENCRYPTION_KEY=966a1c152d7580f51373e51ee5829xyz

# ===== CORS =====
# Include all your domains and the Mac app scheme
ALLOWED_ORIGINS=https://gosubtle.app,https://www.gosubtle.app,http://localhost:5173,subtle://

# ===== FRONTEND =====
FRONTEND_URL=https://gosubtle.app

# ===== ADMIN =====
ADMIN_EMAIL=admin@gosubtle.app

# ===== AZURE OPENAI DEFAULTS =====
DEFAULT_AZURE_API_VERSION=2025-01-01-preview

# ===== LOGGING =====
LOG_LEVEL=info

# ===== RATE LIMITING =====
RATE_LIMIT_WINDOW_MS=60000
RATE_LIMIT_MAX_REQUESTS=100

# ===== NODE ENVIRONMENT =====
NODE_ENV=production

# ===== OPTIONAL: VERCEL KV (for auth codes) =====
# These will be auto-added if you create a KV store in Vercel
# KV_REST_API_URL=<auto-generated>
# KV_REST_API_TOKEN=<auto-generated>

# ===== FRONTEND BUILD VARIABLES =====
# These are for the React app (Vite)
# Leave VITE_API_URL empty to use relative /api paths
VITE_API_URL=
VITE_APP_URL=https://gosubtle.app
VITE_ENABLE_DEV_LOGGING=false

# ===== SUPABASE (NOT NEEDED ANYMORE) =====
# These are from your old setup - NOT needed for new Vercel deployment
# VITE_SUPABASE_URL=<not-needed>
# VITE_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=<not-needed>
